name: Kosmoscore: Rumi's dream
description:
Hello!

"Rumi's dream" is a short visual novel from the upcoming "Kosmoscore" series. "Kosmoscore" is a story about adventures of a group of aliens from the future, trying to save the universe from evil forces. Sounds pretty trite, doesn't it? 

What is "Rumi's dream" about?

It is about a small adventure of a young bunnuf - Rumi.

There he is!

Rumi is a cheerful and friendly boy with a fertile imagination!  He loves to imagine beautiful and creative things. 

One fine night,  he woke up and couldn't  sleep, and then he decides to draw. But here's the problem - he doesn't have paper to draw on. 

Explore the wonderful kingdom Rainbowskies with Rumi to find a piece of paper and meet some of his great friends!

Warning!

The following game contains:

  • Flashing and bright images 
  • Creepy imagery
  • Loud and sudden noises
  • Mention of medicine

It is not recommender for people under the age of 15!

Please note that English is not my first language so I might have mistakes! In the next update I'll probably fix them.

If you want to support me and see more of my content and news on Kosmoscore, please visit my carrd !
